statements.select:
select T1.*, T2.PROCEDURE_NAME, T3.FACTORY_NAME, T4.WORKSHOP_NAME, T5.USER_NAME,case t1.GRADENAME when '一级品' then '合格品' when '二级品' then '次品' when '一级品B' then '合格品B' else T1.GRADENAME end GRADENAME1 from FQG_GRADE_INFO T1 left join SSB_PROCEDURE T2 on T1.WORK_PROCESS_ID = T2.OBJID left join SSB_FACTORY T3 on T1.FACTORY_ID = T3.OBJID left join SSB_WORKSHOP T4 on T1.WORKSHOP_ID = T4.OBJID left join SSB_USER T5 on T1.RECORD_USERID = T5.OBJID
T1.OBJID = #where.OBJID#
T1.GRADENAME like '%'||#where.GRADENAME1#||'%'
T1.DELETE_FLAG = #where.DELETE_FLAG#
T1.WORK_PROCESS_ID = #where.WORK_PROCESS_ID#
T1.FACTORY_ID = #where.FACTORY_ID#
T1.WORKSHOP_ID = #where.WORKSHOP_ID#
ORDER BY $OrderString$
select OBJID sskey, PROCEDURE_NAME ssValue from SSB_PROCEDURE where DELETE_FLAG = 0 order by OBJID
select OBJID sskey, FACTORY_NAME ssValue from SSB_FACTORY where DELETE_FLAG = 0 order by OBJID
select OBJID sskey, WORKSHOP_NAME ssValue from SSB_WORKSHOP where DELETE_FLAG = 0 order by OBJID
select OBJID sskey, USER_NAME ssValue from SSB_USER where DELETE_FLAG = 0 order by OBJID
